name: .FZF
summary: Learn about .FZF files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: If you want to play the sounds an FZF file contains, you can open it in FMJ-Software Awave Studio (Windows). If you want to edit the sounds an FZF file contains, or add additional sounds to the file, you can open it in Casio FZ Librarian (Windows).
To transfer an FZF file to a Casio FZ series keyboard, you must connect the keyboard to your PC and use the FZDUMP utility (Windows) to transfer the file.

Casio FZ Librarian and FMJ-Software Awave Studio can convert the sounds FZF files contain to other formats. Casio FZ Librarian can convert sounds to the .WAV format. FMJ-Software Awave Studio can convert sounds to many formats, including:

images.alt: Screenshot of a .fzf file in FMJ-Software Awave Studio
images.caption: FZF file open in FMJ-Software Awave Studio
